description.narrative: The project will (i) reconstruct or upgrade and climate proof about 59 kilometers (km) of principal national roads, (ii) expand the road maintenance program of the Ministry of Infrastructure (MOI), and (iii) prepare a feasibility study and detailed design for 81 km of principal national roads. In collaboration with other development partners, the project will support the progressive upgrading of the whole of the national road network.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: A more reliable and safer road network

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

By end 2018, 15% reduction in travel time on project roads (2012 baseline: 0.75 hours and 1.25 hours for Tibar to Liquica and Tibar to Gleno respectively to be updated by PMU for each subproject immediately prior to construction)

description.narrative: A more reliable and safer road network

title.narrative: Rate of road crash fatalities (per vehicle-km) on project roads are at least 20% less than the national average (baseline to be determined)

description.narrative: A more reliable and safer road network
